title: Only showing outbox for gmail
creator: jules17
content: Hi, I have just installed thunderbird for android and have set up 5 accounts including a Gmail account. The other 4 accounts show several folders including inbox,outbox,sent,etc. The Gmail account only shows outbox, what can I do to show the other folders? Kind regards

title: Sync Email messages between Tbird Windows and Tbird Android...
creator: jwseavey
content:
How do I get my email messages imported to Android Thunderbird? Getting the accounts set up is easy but I cannot find a way to export my Windows Tbird email messages so they can be imported into the Android Tbird program.

To me, this is something that should be included in both programs so they can be synchronized. What am I missing????
